InteropTopicFilter.name: InteropTopicFilter
InteropTopicFilter.description: Represents the properties by which an interoperability topic's notification can be filtered.

Description.description: The description of the interoperability topic filter.

InteropTopicId.description: The interoperability topic for which the filters are defined.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic filter record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the interoperability topic filter record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the interoperability topic filter.

OperatorType.description: Specifies the type of operator that applies to the filter.

QueryOperatorType.description: Specifies the type of query operator that applies to the filter.

Resource.description: The resource for which the notification is sent.

ResourceField.description: The resource field that's used as a paramater in the filter.

ResourceFieldUrl.description: The URL of the resource field that's used as a paramater in the filter.
